xmp_property.name: Column.Intrinsic.MediaType
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/MediaType_description=Example: still image, movie, video, audio, offline
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/MediaType_label=Media Type

xmp_property.name: Column.Intrinsic.MediaStart
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/MediaStart_description=Original source timecode of first frame of video
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/MediaStart_label=Media Start

xmp_property.name: Column.Intrinsic.MediaEnd
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/MediaEnd_description=Original source timecode of last frame of video
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/MediaEnd_label=Media End

xmp_property.name: Column.Intrinsic.VideoDuration
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/VideoDuration_description=Length of user set video in to out range
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/VideoDuration_label=Video Duration

xmp_property.name: Column.Intrinsic.AudioDuration
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/AudioDuration_description=Length of user set audio in to out range
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/AudioDuration_label=Audio Duration

xmp_property.name: Column.Intrinsic.AudioInfo
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/AudioInfo_description=Audio sample rate, bit rate and channelization
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/AudioInfo_label=Audio Info

xmp_property.name: Column.Intrinsic.VideoUsage
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/VideoUsage_description=Number of times video clip has been used in project sequences
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/VideoUsage_label=Video Usage

xmp_property.name: Column.Intrinsic.AudioUsage
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/AudioUsage_description=Number of times audio clip has been used in project sequences
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/AudioUsage_label=Audio Usage

xmp_property.name: Column.PropertyText.Status
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/Status_description=Status of clip linked to media file; example: Online, Offline
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/Status_label=Status

xmp_property.name: Column.PropertyText.OfflineProperties
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/OfflineProperties_description=Format of offline clip; example: Audio and Video, Audio, Video
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/OfflineProperties_label=Offline Properties

xmp_property.name: Column.PropertyBool.Good
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/Good_description=Preferred shots or takes are marked good
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/Good_label=Good

xmp_property.name: Column.PropertyText.ContentAnalysis
xmp_property.description: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/ContentAnalysis_description=Type of content analysis performed on media
xmp_property.label: $$$/Premiere/PrivateProjectMetaData/ContentAnalysis_label=Content Analysis
